column2: on a recent trip to Chicago we thought we'd try Lou Malnati's and Gino's East and compare. Most people we asked had differing opinions
column3: but Lou Malnati's gets my vote!  At least from a deep dish pizza point-of-view.  I think Gino's had the better atmosphere...LM's was a place people can comfortably bring their kiddos.  Nothing against kiddos...just not my scene!  But the pizza more than made up for it.  And since it's so popular and crowded
column4: they let you place your pizza order while you wait in line!  You still have to wait for it once you get seated but the wait is cut way down!
